action: I want to register new deal information
reason: To visualize deal progress, sales forecasting, and team collaboration
acceptance_criteria: Deal registration is only possible for authenticated users.
Deal IDs are automatically numbered and unique.
Deal name is a required field.
Linking with a Customer ID is mandatory.
Registration fails if a non-existent Customer ID is specified.
Must have a deal status (New/In Progress/Closed Won/Closed Lost).
Amount field only allows numerical values.
Amount must be 0 or greater.
Estimated close date field must exist.
SQL injection countermeasures must be implemented.
Input values must be sanitized (Anti-XSS).
Registration process must be completed within a DB transaction.
Logs for deal registration must be stored.
Logs include user_id, deal_id, and timestamp.
Deal update history must be maintained.
Deals can be logically deleted.
Same validation applies when registering via API.
Response must be in JSON format.
Target response time for API is within 400ms.
Audit logs are stored in tamper-evident storage.
